subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Burton raced past Denny Hamlin on a two-lap sprint to the finish Sunday and Richard Childress Racing swept the top three positions in the Food City 500.
snippet: Jeff Burton raced past Denny Hamlin on a two-lap sprint to the finish Sunday and Richard Childress Racing swept the top three positions in the Food City 500.
